justification: Basic attempt to meet B’s needs (RB depth) but misses that B values possession WRs and trusts consensus—Caleb Foster (Tier 2 possession) fits B perfectly. B already has two Tier 1 RBs plus a Tier 3, so swapping a steady WR for committee RBs (Tier 3 and Tier 5) is unlikely with urgent win needs. Trade is feasible and fits A’s goals, but acceptance odds are overstated and rationale is generic.
